傴字的基本解释

yǔ
见“伛”。

傴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǔ］
［《廣韻》於武切，上麌，影。］
“伛1”的繁体字。
(1)曲背；弯腰。
(2)指弯曲。
(3)迂曲，迂阔。
(4)通“嫗”。爱抚；抚育。参见“傴拊”。
(5)通“區”。疆域。参见“傴宇”。

傴字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　傴； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页114第24
【唐韻】於武切【集韻】【韻會】委羽切，?於上聲。【說文】僂也。【左傳·昭七年】一命而僂，再命而傴，三命而俯，循牆而走。【禮·喪服制】傴者不袒。【註】袒露膊傴者可憎，故不露。【淮南子·齊俗訓】傴者，使之塗。【註】傴人塗地，因其俛也。　俗讀若偶，別作?，?非。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [yǔ]
["Guangyun" Yu Wuqie, Shangzhe, Ying. ]
Traditional characters for "伛1".
(1) Curving back; bending over.
(2) Refers to bending.
(3) Tortuous and tortuous.
(4) Through "women". Caress; nurture. See "漛拊".
(5) Through the "zone". territory. See "Tong Yu".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　伛; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 114-24
[Tang Yun] Yu Wuqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Wei Yuqie, Yu Shangsheng. [Said the text] 偻 also. [Zuo Zhuan·Seventh year of Zhao] One fate and die, then fate, die, three fate, bow down, and walk along the wall. [Ritual and mourning service system] The people are not open. [Note] It is an abomination to show your shoulders, so you don't show it. 【Huainanzi·Qi Suxun】Ten people, make them smeared. [Note] The suffocated land, because of its suffocation.　If you say it in common, don't make it?, it's not.
